title: Continuing To Strengthen Americans' Access to Affordable, Quality Health Coverage

enrichment.summary: This executive order directs federal agencies to continue efforts that make healthcare more affordable and accessible for Americans by strengthening Medicaid and the Affordable Care Act (ACA). It encourages expanding coverage, improving benefits, reducing costs, and simplifying enrollment processes to help more people obtain quality health insurance.
potential_concerns: States that have not expanded Medicaid may resist federal efforts, limiting coverage gains.
Expanding eligibility and reducing paperwork may increase program costs and strain administrative capacity.
Proposed regulatory changes could face legal challenges delaying implementation.
There may be disparities in outreach effectiveness, leaving some underserved populations behind.
